data.comment: John Brooks starts the match. Norwich with the kick-off in Watford.
Etienne Capoue (Watford) has received a yellow card from John Brooks.
In the minute 39, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ismaila Sarr.
Ken Sema with an assist there.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Watford have kicked-off the second half at Vicarage Road.
Tom Cleverley (Watford) has received a first yellow card.
Mario Vrancic is replacing Kieran Dowell for the away team.
In the minute 67, Ben Gibson is on a sub for Jakob Lungi Sorensen for Norwich.
Daniel Farke is making the team's third substitution at Vicarage Road with Jordan Hugill replacing Todd Cantwell.
The home team replace Jeremy Ngakia with Adam Masina.
In the minute 74, Watford make their second substitution with Stipe Perica replacing Andre Gray.
Will Hughes is replacing Tom Cleverley for Watford at Vicarage Road.
At Vicarage Road, Ismaila Sarr has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 85, The home team have replaced Kiko Femenia with Marc Navarro. This is the fourth substitution made today by Xisco.
Watford make their fifth substitution with Nathaniel Chalobah replacing Etienne Capoue.
Will Hughes (Watford) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 87, Josh Martin is on a sub for Kenny McLean for Norwich.
Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a fifth substitution, with Lukas Rupp replacing Christoph Zimmermann.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
